review: Highly recommend. I'm a recent college grad who opted to not get cable and this has been awesome. DEFINITELYYYYYYYY recommend getting Amazon Prime so that you can enjoy the great shows that they have to offer (I LOVE TRANSPARENT!) on your Fire TV Stick. Amazon Prime is the best decision I've made- well, ever. I've been really happy with my Fire TV Stick and Amazon Prime since I got it two weeks ago!
author: Kaitlyn

review: Absolutely love it! So easy and great having all the different services on 1 little stick versus the boxes that only have a few which requires different appliances to get different services. This would make a great gift and I think I will be buying some as Xmas presents :)
author: Toni M. "Toni"

review: Fire Stick is easy to use ..just put in your USB port , the remote is nice and its simple to navigate to the apps your looking for ,I recommend signing up for Amazon Prime! lots of great Original programs as well as all your regular TV shows.
author: CGray

review: I love it  I don't have no problem with it
author: Kaylene Hernandez

review: I'm really enjoying my fire stick. Best thing I've ever purchase.
author: Lyannette Dade
